oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Homestead way to grow and serve rhubarb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Six page foldout booklet titled, "Homestead way to grow and serve rhubarb" which provides tips and instructions on how to plant, freeze, can, and store the vegetable rhubarb. Includes recipes on making various rhubarb desserts, juices, and sauces with a full page of illustrations of rhubarbs. Priced at 25 cents.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gourlie, John C.; Robinson, Carolyn, 1915-
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Vegetable gardening; Kitchen gardens
Rhubarb; Vegetables; Food; Homesteading
